import React,{useState} from "react"; import axios from "axios"; import { toast } from 'react-toastify' export default function Add() { const [title, setTitle]=useState() const [author, setAuthor]=useState() const [cover, setCover]=useState() async function saveBook(e){ e.preventDefault() try { const res = await axios.post('http://127.0.0.1:2014/add',{title,author,cover}) console.log(res.data) if(res.status('Ok')){ toast.success("Data saved successfully") setTitle('') setAuthor('') setCover('') } } catch (error) { toast.info(error) } } return (
Add New Book
setTitle(e.target.value)} required />
setAuthor(e.target.value)} required />
setCover(e.target.value)} required />
); }
